statements: UPDATE news_data SET news_title='New Title', news_content='Updated content' WHERE news_id=1;

UPDATE news_data SET publish_date='2022-09-15 10:00:00', news_content='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed non diam orci, ac fringilla eros.', sentiment_score=0.6 WHERE news_id=8;
